channel.title: [Pi] Teleport help

item.title: [Pi] Teleport help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m adding an animation to my teleport but whenever I do it, it tele’s me to the location and then does the animation, did I do this command wrong?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone")) { c.gfx0(1034); c.startAnimation(6064); c.getPA().movePlayer(3012, 3362, 4); }

Read full topic
